problem_text: In Fig. 4-20a, a plane moves due east while the pilot points the plane somewhat south of east, toward a steady wind that blows to the northeast. The plane has velocity $\vec{v}_{P W}$ relative to the wind, with an airspeed (speed relative to the wind) of $215 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h}$, directed at angle $\theta$ south of east. The wind has velocity $\vec{v}_{W G}$ relative to the ground with speed $65.0 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h}$, directed $20.0^{\circ}$ east of north. What is the magnitude of the velocity $\vec{v}_{P G}$ of the plane relative to the ground?
